attributes.action: Has council tax become a tax on the poor and working classes
attributes.background: It doesn't seem right or fair that bands stop at H £320,000.00 when house prices continue to go on up in value all the way up £90,000,000.00 a Z if there ever was 1. These massive places clearly will be using and draining more of the local amenities /infrastructure

rejection.details:
We are not sure what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Petitions have to call on the Government or Parliament to take a clear action. 

You might like to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/188125. Or you could start a new petition explaining clearly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
